issue.title: Frequent escalate to SIGKILL on shutdown

content.raw: I'm testing with Gazebo 2.0.0 and DRCSim 3.1.0 (latest releases, from debs).  It seems like this problem has largely gone away since last time I looked.  Certainly I'm no longer consistently getting a delay + `escalating to SIGKILL` message on shutdown.  In a bunch of tests with various `.launch` files in `drcsim_gazebo`, I was only able to get that `escalating message` once.  So perhaps something in the restructuring of the plugins has mitigated the problem.  I'll keep looking.
